channel.title: Hiden Crowns
channel.description:
Anyone got a command to hide your crown?
Example: ::hidecrown When you type it shows in the chat without crown and when you type the command again, You will get the crown back
Anyone have this command?

item.title: Hiden Crowns
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

well theres one way i could think of, just make a new rights eg, rights=4 or sumfin and in your client and server make sure theres no crown image in the cache showing up for rights=4 that way you’ll have the rights=4 with no crown next to your name.
could try it that way? and then you can make a command to get rights=4

Read full topic

item.title: Hiden Crowns
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

I dont think so…Because i dont think u can take the crown away unless if u delete it…If you want to delete it (NOT RECOMMENDED) look in your c drive or client folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Hiden Crowns
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Naseem, post:1, topic:470436”]Anyone got a command to hide your crown?

Example: ::hidecrown
When you type it shows in the chat without crown
and when you type the command again, You will get the crown back

Anyone have this command?[/quote]
No, but I doubt it would be possible to make. Unless you only want your crown not shown in the yell… Crowns are invoked by the client.
Well wait… Maybe if you did a client sided command, and made it erase all the crown loading…
Yeah, too complex.

Read full topic
